response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for both parties involved. This exceptional item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am extending this opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer represents an exclusive chance to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive advantage. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate this transaction with you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
